author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: standalone, single-script version of nedb that runs in both browser and nodejs
name: nedb-lite

scripts.build-doc: MODE_LINENO=0 utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "module.exports={ exampleFileList:['README.md','test.js','index.js'], moduleDict:{ Nedb:{exports:require('./index.js')}, 'Nedb.prototype':{aliasList:['collection'], exports:require('./index.js').prototype} } }"
scripts.test: export MODE_LINENO=0 && export NODE_ENV=test && utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test node test.js
